channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fired Justice Department lawyer accuses agency of planning to defy court orders
item.description: The accusations from a veteran government lawyer add to broader concern about the Trump administration's repeated clashes with the judiciary.

item.title: Breaking another presidential norm, Trump drops the f-bomb on camera

item.title: 6/24: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: President Trump expressed frustration with Israel and Iran amid a fragile ceasefire that was announced Monday. Plus, artist Ayra Starr talks about her...

item.title: Temperature in New York City reaches 100 degrees as eastern US swelters under extreme heat wave
item.description: The temperature in New York City has reached 100 degrees as the eastern U.S. sweltered under an extreme heat wave.

item.title: Brazilian tourist who fell off Indonesian volcano found dead
item.description: Juliana Marins survived the initial fall during an early morning hike along a trail on Mount Rinjani.

item.title: How a volatile 24 hours edged the Middle East to a ceasefire
item.description: From an attack on a US air base to a fragile ceasefire, this is how the Middle East conflict changed overnight.

item.title: How prepared are American forces for attacks from Iran?
item.description: CBS News Pentagon reporter Eleanor Watson has the latest on U.S. military movements amid the shaky ceasefire agreement between Israel and Iran.

item.title: British man charged over 'wedding' with child, 9, at Disneyland Paris
item.description: The 39-year-old is a convicted sexual offender who is wanted in the UK, French prosecutors have said.

item.title: Leaders arrive at Hague summit as Nato chief Rutte flatters Trump
item.description: It is the US president's first Nato summit since 2019 and all 32 leaders are set to commit to a big hike in defence spending.
